item.description:
This is a sweet treat swap ...

1.  Bring a tasting plate of your treats so we can all taste them (very tiny pieces).

2. Bring 36 or more bite sized treats for swapping

3.  Bring a holiday container to put your treats in

4.  Bring your recipe

We will provide a couple of BIG salads & a soup that we can all eat before we get to swapping, so plan on eating dinner too!  You are welcome to contribute a mealtime dish too if you want, but it is not necessary.

We host a monthly potluck, on the 3rd Sunday of the month, so put it in your calendar & come join the fun!

 

Looking forward to seeing you soon!  :-)

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Sweet Treat Holiday Swap!
